Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details From February 2002 to May 2006, youth were screened at four academic sites: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, McLean Hospital and Cambridge Health Alliance at Harvard Medical School, University of Washington, and Case Western Reserve University.
